page.title: 14Farming (2) Beef, Bowness.
page.content: In spring{beef cattle}have their calves.Each year there is a different{ {letter}to call them by. If the year was letter{A,}and the calf was a{girl, the name might be{Ada.}If it was a boy it might be called{Alan.} If all goes to plan the best calves get{auctioned}in summer. Before going to auction they would be tied up with a very loud{radio}next to them so that they wouldn't get scared when they were there! In autumn the cattle are rounded up and put inside the{shippon}and fed on {cow cake,hay,straw}and{silage}during the winter.
